import Nav from './nav'; import './css/product.css'; import axios from 'axios'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; function Body() { var id_delete=-1; function Delete(id){ id_delete=id; console.log("delete ", id_delete); } var id_update=-1; function Update(id){ id_update=id; console.log("update ",id_update); } const [product,setProduct]= useState([]); useEffect(()=> { axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/') .then(res => setProduct(res.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)); },[]); console.log(product); var List_product= product.map((item,index) => {item.id} {item.name} {item.price} ); return (
